doc:
Diana Sowle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diana_Sowle 0 Diana Mae Sowle (née Laumer; June 19, 1930 – October 19, 2018) was an American actress of film and theater and voice artist, best known for playing Mrs. Bucket (Charlie Bucket's mother) in the 1971 film Willy Wonka the Chocolate Factory and her performance of "Cheer up Charlie" in that film, although her voice in the song was dubbed by Diana Lee.Sowle joined the cast while in Germany, where it was filmed. At the time of her death in 2018, she was the last surviving parent from the film. Sowle's death left two remaining adult cast members of Wonka: Tim Brooke-Taylor, who portrayed a computer scientist, although his role was uncredited, and Rusty Goffe, who was in his twenties when he played one of the Oompa Loompas. Diana_Mae_Sowle ( née_Laumer ; June_19_,_1930 – October_19_,_2018 ) was an_American_actress of film_and_theater_and_voice_artist , best_known for playing Mrs._Bucket ( Charlie_Bucket 's_mother ) in the_1971_film_Willy_Wonka the_Chocolate_Factory and her_performance of " Cheer up_Charlie " in that_film , although her_voice in the_song was_dubbed by Diana_Lee.Sowle joined the_cast while in Germany , where it was_filmed . At the_time of her_death in 2018 , she was the_last_surviving_parent from the_film . Sowle 's_death left two_remaining_adult_cast_members of Wonka : Tim_Brooke-Taylor , who portrayed a_computer_scientist , although his_role was uncredited , and Rusty_Goffe , who was in his_twenties when he played one of the_Oompa_Loompas .
